Articles.Content:
I have a slight issue. I recently discovered the advanced tweakables option. It seemed really useful at first, but then i discovered that it messes with some modded parts. For example MechJeb doesn't work anymore. It just doesn't SHOW the GUI. Also, some of the parts from the station parts expansion have different modes, similar to different colors of fuel tanks. With advanced tweakables on, it causes them to all merge together into one. Turning them off and restarting them fixes it, but i can't use the mods at the same time as advanced tweakables.

Please help, LusBax.

You might want to take this over here:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/70-technical-support-pc-modded-installs/

Since a lot of people use Advanced Tweakables and I've never come across a single person experiencing your issue. it must be on your end.
